    • Method Detail

      • sendEmail

        public void sendEmail​(CredentialPacket toEmail,
                      java.lang.Boolean purpose,
                      java.lang.String... files)
        Utility method to send simple HTML email
        Parameters:
        purpose - indicates email's body content and header (greeting new user or new files notification
        toEmail - indicates the receiver of message
        files - array of file names to send in notification

        Method uses ExecutorService to submit task of sending email
